descriptions: ["Description3 Bedrooms plus Maid'sExtended and Upgraded\xa0\xa0Beautifully PresentedLarge Landscaped GardenVery PrivateNew FlooringVacant on Transfer\xa0House Hunters is proud and pleased to offer this exclusive,\xa0unique and immaculate Home, This\xa0beautifully\xa0extended and upgraded type 9 villa is\xa0located in one of the best spots in Saheel not only quiet and tranquil but also easy access to all amenities\xa0and exits. The kitchen is located at the heart of the house with breakfast room / family room which is also extended with doors leading to the beautifully landscaped entertainers delight garden. On the first floor, master bedroom en suite complete with wardrobes and overlooks the large community swimming pool,\xa0 two further bedrooms with ample storage space sharing a jack-and-jill bathroom and an extra study. This villa is one of a kind and should not be missed !\xa0 Call us today to view this amazing property!House Hunters Real Estate are known as the No 1 Preferred Agency in Arabian Ranches. Landlords have come to learn just how quickly we turn these properties around and as a result we have the most extensive, current list of property in the market.  Our agents are available 7 days a week, 8:30 am - 8:30 pm daily at the Ranches Retail Center. So why not pass by for a chat with one of our experienced agents today.Permit no."]

descriptions: ['DescriptionBeautiful 3 Story Atrium Entry 2 With Magnificent Skyline\xa0View- Rare 3 Storey Atrium Entry- High Odd Number- Vacant- Option To Include Furniture- Five Bedrooms- Huge Top Floor Master Suite- Stunning Skyline Views- Private Pool- Private Beach- Landscaped GardenEdwards and Towers are delighted to offer to the market this very high number and premium skyline view atrium entry 2 on O Frond.As you enter the property past the private driveway and landscaped front garden you are greeted with the double height atrium and views through to the garden, pool, sea and marina skyline. The large living and dining room is open plan and boasts many floor to ceiling windows and doors giving an abundance of natural light and maximizing on the views. There is a guess toilet, fully fitted kitchen, large maids room, utility area and double garage on the ground floor also as well as a large room that can be used for office or additional reception or may easily be converted to a sixth bedroom.To the rear is a private pool garden with a raised decking area that also enhances the views from the garden and steps down to the private beach and the sea.On the first floor is a spacious landing and four large en-suite bedrooms, with balconies and built in storage; a staircase to the top floor master suite which contains a huge bedroom, generous walk in wardrobe and bathroom and a large balcony enjoying superb views.The property is vacant and can include furnishings. Viewings are easily arranged and highly recommended on this well priced opportunity.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionThis stunning beachfront property has been built to the highest possible standards and enjoys one of the most sought after locations on the Palm Jumeirah.The owners have spared no expense, using only the latest cutting edge technology and the world\x92s finest products to create a flawless home which can only be described as exquisite. The villa has been extended to accommodate approximately 8,000 sq ft of built up area on a 14,683 sq ft plot, with the breathtaking Dubai marina skyline taking centre stage.The sophisticated yet relaxed floor plan provides a unique ambiance.\xa0Upon entering the house, a welcoming reception area is graced with a glass elevator alongside the marble staircase. The formal lounge, which enjoys magnificent views due to the natural light flooding in through seven huge picture windows, flows effortlessly into the raised family room, which has been designed for comfort, using custom made mashrabiya screens to create a warm and homely environment. The state of the art kitchen was designed by Poggenpohl using the latest Gaggenau appliances with a breakfast bar overlooking the outdoor terrace, which can be opened up via sliding glass doors. Two self contained maids rooms with separate laundry area and an outdoor drivers room complete the lower level.The first floor contains 5 large en-suite bedrooms with an eclectic mix of Onyx marble, glass and bespoke cabinetry. The fixtures and fittings in this superb villa have been meticulously hand-picked and imported from all over the world with attention to detail you will find difficult to find or replicate in any other property in Dubai, let alone the Palm. Every room has been fitted with a state of the art Vantage Domotica system which operates the media, lighting and curtains throughout, using sensors and touch screens with full i-phone/i-pad connectivity.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionWe are pleased to present this beautifully decorated and fully furnished 6 bedroom signature villa EXCLUSIVELY to the Palm Jumeirah resale market.A must-see property and a wonderful family home, this Mediterranean Great Rotunda signature villa is nestled perfectly in the middle of one of the most sought after and prestigious fronds with an awe inspiring view of the Atlantis hotel and the highly anticipated Royal Atlantis. Kept in immaculate condition, it has been meticulously maintained to a very high standard by the same European family who have owned it since it was handed over in 2008. The ground floor consists of a formal lounge, majlis, living room, dining room, kitchen, 2 ensuite guest bedrooms, maids room with separate laundry room, drivers room and a double garage. The first floor comprises 3 spacious en-suite bedrooms all with private balconies and a very impressive master suite which has a balcony and a huge terrace overlooking the sea, beach, pool and garden.The villa has been sensibly priced to sell quickly, so viewings are highly recommended.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionAl Reef Villas is counted as one of the U.A.E largest and most progressive projects to date, spanning a vast area of one million square meters, and encompassing a total of 4194 residential units and villas, with a capacity to accommodate approximately 15,000 residents. 
It is located in close proximity to Abu Dhabi International Airport, Al Falah, Shahama and Al Raha Beach communities, right on the expressways leading to Al Ain, Dubai, Yas Island, and the Sheikh Zayed Bridge respectively. As a complete residential community, Al Reef Villas incorporates a varied range of amenities to suit its residents’ needs, including various recreational, retail and financial services, as well as 24 hour security.
